text.name: AGROSPONSOR_SP1
text.text: In partnership with JCB, ITRunner, Case, New Holland and other companies. \n The AgroSponsor offers you a sponsorship of %s for the purchase of equipment and tools! We hope your success with the AgroSponsor and Partners!

text.name: AGROSPONSOR_SP2
text.text: In exclusive partnership with JCB. \n The AgroSponsor gives you a sponsorship of %s for the purchase of equipment and tools!
